column1: All my friends - and even strangers - want to know my secret to flawless, perfect skin, especially when i share my advanced age. This Golden Balm beats the most expensive skincare brand! Needless to say, Walmart has the best price.

This product was a great buy and really does make my skin softer and wrinkles less noticeable. I had received a sample and used it and was pleased with results and thought I would try for an extended period of time. I am very pleased with results.
Better then other famous & expensive creams.
This is the best I have found for the price. Great for 50+ crowd! I break out easily and this did not make my face break out. My skin soaks it up and it doesn't leave a film.

This neck and chest balm was creamy and easy to put on. The scent was a little strong for me, but I loved the size of the jars and the jars themselves were pretty. I especially liked the fact that this kit came with a product for your neck and chest area because I feel that this is an important area for ageing women and doesn't get included very often. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I LIKE

I think,this product is fantastic! From it's light, wonderful scent..To how soft and hydrated it makes your skin feel. All you need is just a tiny bit at a time because,a little truly does go very far.( I feel The only down side is:Using more than about a quarter size for your whole face can cause your skin to feel a bit oily.) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this moisturizer thinking it would lend golden glow to my aging skin in addition to other old age problems such as need to firm skin, smooth away wrinkles but apparently not. It is very thick to apply, thicker than what I am used to, has a nice smell but there is nothing special about it. I did not see any changes in my skin. Will not be buying again.
Too much scent in it and it didn't do what I thought it would do. Disappointed. Also, too greasy, doesn't soak in very well.

I can't believe that after just 7 days my 49 year old skin looks better than when I was 30! My skin was dry no matter what I used. No longer, my face is silky smooth and the crows feet that I have were getting deeper. Now you can barely see them. And what dark circles under my eyes? Those are gone too! After just one week. I can't wait to see what the next few days/weeks brings. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The chest,neck and face balm instantly became my favorite. It really has done a wonderful job on my chest and neck. I've noticed how much of a difference in the way my neck and chest appears. Firm and my skin doesn't look so dull as it did before I started using the balm. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using L'Oreal Golden Balm for over 2 weeks now. Maybe its my personal preferences but I find L'Oreal Golden Balm to be very "oily." It stays on the surface of my face instead of "sinking" in. I'm getting used to the smell but not the fact that as I get ready in the morning the sweat bead gather on my forehead and I find myself needing to blot my face for a hour or so before the issue is reconciled. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I noticed an immediate increase in the hydration level after using this face cream. My skin felt soft and refreshed after each use. After a few weeks of using the product I noticed a more youthful, healthy glow. My skin is healthier after using this product and people at work have even commented on how much better my skin has been looking. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this product for a little over two weeks now. Pros: My face looks and feels much softer. Cons: Within the first few days of using it my face broke out. But to be fair, my face breaks out with any change to my regimen. Overall I will keep using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this cream primarily at night. I like its thicker luxurious feel. The cream spreads easily, a little goes a long way. I don't find the smell offensive or that the cream leaves an oily residue. I will buy this cream again and highly recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is great! I finally have something to put on my face, neck and chest. It has lessened the signs of wrinkles, even in the little time I've had it. I've noticed a huge difference. It goes on smooth and my skin feels wonderful. Feels hydrated especially since its winter and it tends to be drier during this time of year. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The L'Oreal Parish Age Perfect Hydra-Nutrition Golden Balm Face, Neck & Chest made my skin feel so soft without that greasy feeling. The smell was fresh and clean without being overly scented. The only negative is that after using it for about a week my sensitive skin had a slight reaction. It was such a disappointment because it made my face so hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this products gives great moisturizer to neck and forehead. I used it twice a day and it seems to have eased the fine wrinkles on my forehead. I would recommend this product to the older ladies. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

With the weather in decline , i found the Golden Balm to Be a life saver i just apply this before my foundation keep my skin moisturized and supple all day . Its a great product and i recommend this for daily use, its awesome. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Although I have never used a neck cream before, this was a good product. It felt smooth and light. It made my neck feel supple and somewhat tighter. I noticed the wrinkles were a little more diminished. The overall product seemed pretty good. The balm was good as well and it had a nice cooling sensasion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin is very dry in the winter, especially my face, and this is very thick cream, which is too thick, even for my dry skin. If you have extremely dry skin, then this would be the perfect lotion for you. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I LOVE this balm. When I got older (I'm 41) for some reason, my chest area was extremely dry, even in the summer. I thought it may have been a product I was using, but it wasn't, just another change that comes with getting older (and better lol) This product not only moisturizes my neck and chest, it smells so yummy, and feels so good on my skin. I apply it immediately after my morning/night showers. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using the face, neck and chest cream for a bit now and it has made my skin very soft. It's not greasy at all and goes on quick and easy. Leaves my skin feeling great! The only thing I have to mention that may be a dislike to some, is the scent. It does have a very flowery scent to it, so if you are one wear perfume, maybe this product is not for you because it is strong enough to over power a light perfume you may wear. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this on face neck chest and yes even my hands dont want them to age so quickly, this product gives you all day moister to your skin and ontop of that it smells wonderful none greasy just soft skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin was super dry and needed a good face cream. I am glad that I got this product because it is really good. The smells is great, it is making my skin very soft. Great to use every night before bed. My only concern is that I noticed that if I use the lotion during the day my face becomes very greesy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

When I see the word "balm" I wondered if it would be thick. The balm is actually perfect for sleep and days without makeup. After a week of using my skin feels very soft and very nourished. It is the winter season and generally my skin tends to be a bit dry so this balm is great and I love the fragrance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the face balm is great for the skin when paired with the night/day cream. You face immediately feels nourished and moist. My skin is usually dry in certain areas but after twonweeks, I can definitely notice that it is getting softer and firmer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Overall I think the Hydra-Nutrition Golden Balm is a good product. My skin feels soft and hydrated without being greasy, however I only gave it 4 stars because the Balm is so thick. I would prefer a product that smoothed over my skin a bit easier. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This went on splendidly, however, it did not absorb into the skin as well as one might hope. I did like the texture and it delivered as promised with smoother skin. Also I did notice slight reduction in fine lines. But if you put this on your neck and chest and wear your hair down, your hair will become oily where it brushed against the chest and neck area. That was definitely a downfall. The pros in the end outweighed the cons, but only slightly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This balm is amazing. I love the way my neck already looks firmer after only two weeks. It melts into your skin and is super easy to use. I love that the directions are easy to understand. L'OREAL tells you exactly what order to use their products in. They tell you exactly how to apply [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Face, Neck, & Chest Balm was extremely smooth to put on. It left my skin feeling moisturized and soft. However, the fragrance in the balm is very strong and left my skin irritated. I would not suggest using this product for anyone with sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My neck and chest have never looked better! I am 32 and have sun damage from growing up in south Florida. My chest and neck looked prematurely older than I felt they should. I have been using this for around 2 weeks now and I feel like my neck and chest look much younger than I could imagine! I have the whole system and have been using all of them and am very happy with the results. My skin is softer and glowing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Not only does this product smell great but it really leaves your skin feeling hydrated all day!! It doesn't have a greasy feel like most creams. It also doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy after applying it. It is very light on the skin and PERFECT for the cooler weather that dries your skin fast! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

L'Oreal has just put did themselves again. Golden Balm goes on smooth and leaving skin feeling amazingly soft and shiny. The soft smell and the smooth texture makes you feel so feminine and happy just to know that there is a product out there that works perfectly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this product is Amazing!! I was looking for something to help my "turkey neck". In two short weeks I noticed a difference!! The lines are less visible. This balm feels wonderful on my skin. It hydrates without being greasy. A new staple in my skincare regimen!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

L'Oreal Paris is a common household name among women. However this facial cream is honestly some of the best I have used. During the winter months my skin takes a beating especially my exposed face. Nothing seems to help longer than a few hours. I applied this under my make up. By 8pm my face still felt moisturizer. I will def be using this morning and night and can't wait to see and feel how my skin feels after a few weeks! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think the golden balm is super effective in that my skin felt firmer after just a few days of use My skin feels soft and hydrated and it just looks and feels smoother to me I have used this for 2 weeks and have noticed a big change in the way my skin feels and looks I have dry skin on my face and it feels smooth all over no dry spots at all, I love the smell and the texture of the cream , a little goes a long way The cream is silky smooth and so is my face and neck [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

First, I like that this has neck and chest in the title of the product. Typically, I neglect those areas in my skin care routine but not with this product. Like the eye balm, this is thick and rich and makes my skin feel healthy after applying it. I appreciate that it's not greasy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this golden cream on my neck only. My face tends to be too oily, so putting this on my neck is perfect. It goes on great, and I can tell a difference with the way my neck feels. I do think someone with a different skin type would really like this on their cheeks as well. I only out this on my neck though. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was probably my favorite product in the age perfect line. It's thick but didn't feel overly heavy. I worked this into my neck and it had a slight tingly feeling so I felt like it was working. Would be best for mature skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for a couple of weeks, and can see a positive difference on the skin of my neck area. It is a very thick product, so I had to stop using it on my face. I have normal skin, not dry at all. This product is too rich for my skin type. It works great for my neck, and the rich formula is making a difference on that delicate area. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutelyfell in love with this product. It works for the face, neck and chest. After using for a week I can tell my skin is already softening up. I really like the smell and willcontinue to use. I was afraid that it would be greasy, but its not. 5 stars for me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The golden balm is amazing! It has completely eliminated any dry winter patches I've chronically had in the past. It only takes a little bit for my entire face so the product is going to last a long time. It does have a floral scent that I am not particularly fond of, but my skin has cleared up and feels so much healthier that I can ignore it, but it was very surprising to my nostrils at first. I will most definitely be buying this balm again when I run out of my current jar. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Hydra-Nutrition Golden Balm Face, Neck & Chest cream is light and refreshing! I love the way it makes my skin feel revitalized and clean. It is not too perfume smelling and does not itrritate my skin. It goes on smooth and is creamy. It is not oily. It is light and I can't even tell I have it on. Slight discoloration on my neck appear to be lighter and going away. I can't wait to see how much better my skin looks after a few more weeks! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this product along side L'Oreal Age Perfection day/night cream, eye cream and facial oil and loved it. This was my absolute favorite of the bunch. It make my skin feel so smooth and taut. And leaves such a lovely smell, light and not at all chemically. I have very sensitive skin, to the point I can't wear makeup but this product did not aggravate it at all, quite the opposite it feels great. I defiantly plan to continue using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Loreal face ,neck,and chest is the best. I noticed a change within a couple of days. My skin is smoother. Looks healthy,and young. The fine lines are disappearing. The dark spots are fading. I have a healthy youthful appearance to my skin. Definitely will continue to use [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I found the balm to be a bit thick and greasy. While it kept my normally dry skin moisturized, it did not seem to soak into the skin but rather rest on top of it, leaving an oily appearance. I applied my makeup on top of the balm and did not notice any caking though. I would also prefer the balm be unscented. There is no noticeable difference in my skin other than it being more hydrated but other benefits like firmer skin may come with more product use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

A nice light citrus smell, soaks in nice doesn't leave the skin feeling greasy, which is a plus. It's a heavier cream, if you prefer a lighter cream, this may not be a fit for you but overall a nice, heavier cream for dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am expecting a later in life baby and it has caused some stretch marks. This product is perfect for that. It might not be the intended use but I would definitely recommend that other older mothers look into this and purchase it to keep their skin looking great. I have also used it on the areas recommended and found that I enjoy the scent, hydration, and ease of use. It is a great product that can be expanded into other areas of skin care. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think Age Prefect Hydra-Nutrition Golden Balm is great. It helps moisturize my face neck and chest leaving it smooth and feeling great throughout the day. Also making it firmer. Not fond of the perfume smell but other then that I love it. You will too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried the Golden Face, Neck, & Chest Balm and it's great. The blotches on my chest are clearing after only one week. My neck is firmer and it doesn't look like I'm forming another chin. I would highly recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Before trying this line of products, I was never much for taking time for an extravagant beauty regiment. These products are super quick and simple to apply, I am sold. This balm is very nice, it's thick and it blends in so smoothly. My skin looks so much healthier and brighter. I have found myself using it every day when I get up and when I go to bed. This is the first beauty product I will actually take the time to use before bed, well, this and the day/night cream and the eye cream. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this stuff! I am always skeptical when it comes to trying new face creams. Most of them do nothing but leave my skin dried out afterwards, or completely oily. After just the first use of the eye cream and face, neck and chest balm I am hooked!!!!! I have been telling everyone I know about this stuff! I will continue to use it and spread the word!!! Thanks!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product. It was the first one I've tried that didn't make me break out. I love the creamy feel of it and the fragrance isn't overwhelming either. It made my skin feel so soft and silky. I will definitely continue using this product until it is all gone! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin is changing completely, every time I use the cream my skin becomes more smoother, rejuvenated,healthy looking. I for sure will continue using L'Oréal perfect age from now on. You should try it 2 ,u won't be sorry. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this product. It seems greasy when you first apply it, but it really moisturizes amazingly well and has not caused me to break out. It really helps me to apply and blend my foundation when I apply this Balm first. I had a small spot on my chest that was really weathered looking from many past sunburns and this balm has already made that spot start looking really healthy and moisturized. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the creamiest moisturizer I have ever tried. It glides on so smoothly making your face and neck feeling very soft. With my skin after using other moisturizers, my forehead would start flaking by evening. But not with this product, it has my skin still feeling so moisturized until night. Definitely the best day moisturizer I have ever used. I highly recommend this product if you have very dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I feel like this product is doing what it's supposed to. I do feel some tightening upon application. Unfortunately, since the package says it's geared for mature, dry skin, I think it's not geared for me. I'm almost 40 but my skin is not dry and the added "moisture" is having an unwanted effect, clogged pores...in my neck and chest. I wonder if my skin was not on the normal to oily spectrum then I'd be more satisfied with the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Hydra-Nutrition Golden Balm Face, Neck, & Chest is a great way to help feel younger and well moisturized. I am fifty years old and used the product for only one week. I have already noticed my skin feeling tighter and smoother. I will continue to use it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This balm has a thick creamy texture and a pleasant scent. The scent is a nice clean scent with an almost a soft citrus after tone. I like that although it's thick it absorbs quickly leaving my skin feeling moisturized but not oily or greasy. Within 5 days of using this is notices a difference in the feeling of my neck area. It wasn't tight and dry feeling. The itchiness I get from the winter disappeared after the first use. I'd highly recommend this product to anyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was very creamy and smooth feeling. It glided onto my skin nicely. I really liked the feel of it. It was very easy to put on. There are written directions with pictures. This made my neck look more toned and feel very soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have a new favorite! Of the 3 products I have tried, this is my favorite. I do not have tons of experience with this type of product but so far I am hooked. My skin feels and looks softer. This product has a slightly thicker and richer feel than the night cream but still does not feel heavy when you apply it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I ave trouble finding good creams due to my sensitive skin. This will definitely remain as my day cream! Light but very moisturizing. The smell is also nice. Not overly perfumy. Very subtle womanly scent. Can't go wrong with it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been applying the L'Oréal Golden Balm since the day I got it! About 2 weeks I an have seen or felt a noticeable change maybe it too soon to tell. I do have to say the Balm is very rich and a small amount does the job. It has a very pleasant smell and I am going to continue to use and hopefully I will see or feel even if it minimal change. For the price this is a winner it's worth the money!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This balm moisturizes very well and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and youthful. It absorbs well and has a lovely rich texture and nice scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using the entire collection of the Loreal Paris Age Perfect Hydra Nutrition for a little over a week. I think the Golden Balm is the game changer. I absolutely love this product, it's very creamy and light weight, it doesn't leave your face feeling grease. I've never used L'Orel products before and will definitely continue using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love how it makes my skin feel soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love that after using the balm I feel not only moisturized but also clean. I actually look forward to using it when I wake up and before bed. It has a soft smell to it that is mature. I was kind of leery of this product at first because it is so thick. I had nothing to worry about. L'Oréal has done it again. A great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream smells great and makes my skin feel super smooth. However it does feel a quite oily. I think it's too greasy to wear under makeup during the day and I'd be worried about what it would do to my pillow cases if I wore it at night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The golden balm is like butter for your face has a very mild scent. I tried many facial moisturizers but this takes the cake it really moisturized and hydrated my skin. I have very dry skin. This one is perfect for hydration. It goes on smooth and doesn't not make you makeup look bad. I have been using this product in the morning and at night and can see the difference in my skin. L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Hydra-Nutrition Golden Balm Face, Neck & Chest. I have only used this a couple times and can already tell my skin is softer and smoother. Love the way it makes my skin feel. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The loreal Paris age perfect hydra nutrition golden face, neck, and chest balm and the facial day/night cream works very well. My face is always so dry. Espically in the cold weather. Great products [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

OMG, noticeable difference in my skin after just a few days. Faithfully using it morning and evening and my skin is so much softener. Getting into a routine with all the products and this 51 year is looking younger [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

At my age my skin has been dry and dull this product puts the moisture back into your skin the small lines disappear and your skin feels like silk. I told my sister and my girlfriend and they are buzzing about this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the product so far. I use it just as the directions state to and when i told my mom about the campaign i was on she immediately wanted to both join and try out the products.
